title: Photoelectric - new frequency when Kmax quadruples

content.question: When light with frequency <math alttext="f sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>f</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math> is incident on a metal surface, the electrons emitted from the surface have a maximum kinetic energy <math alttext="K sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>K</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>. Which of the following correctly describes the frequency <math alttext="f sub 4" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>f</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></math> of light that is needed to emit electrons with a maximum kinetic energy <math alttext="K sub 4, end sub, equals, 4 K sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>K</mi><mn>4</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><msub><mi>K</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math> from the same surface?

choices.label: <math alttext="f sub 4, end sub, equals, f sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>f</mi><mn>4</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>f</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>

<math alttext="f sub 1 is less than f sub 4, which is less than 4 f sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>f</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mi>f</mi><mn>4</mn></msub><mo><</mo><mn>4</mn><msub><mi>f</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>
<math alttext="f sub 4, end sub, equals, 4 f sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>f</mi><mn>4</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><msub><mi>f</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>
<math alttext="f sub 4, end sub, is greater than, 4 f sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>f</mi><mn>4</mn></msub><mo>></mo><mn>4</mn><msub><mi>f</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="f sub 1 is less than f sub 4, which is less than 4 f sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>f</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mi>f</mi><mn>4</mn></msub><mo><</mo><mn>4</mn><msub><mi>f</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
